author: Melissa Repko
title: Lowe's to advertise during NFL Draft, hinting a bolder marketing strategy is part of its turnaround plans
description: As other companies have slashed their marketing budgets or dropped out of advertising campaigns, Lowe's became a presenting sponsor of the NFL Draft.
content:
A sign asking for customers to maintain "social distancing" due to the spread of coronavirus (COVID-19) is displayed at the Lowe's Home and Garden center on April 02, 2020 in Scottsdale, Arizona.
In the spring, customers usually come to Lowe's to buy gardeni… [+6511 chars]
